landing zone.description:
You look around and you see a beautiful 'Sandy Beach' that stretches 
beyond the horizon to your right and 'Coco Forest', filled with coconuts,
to your left. There are also sticks scattered around the shoreline.
landing zone.name: LANDING ZONE

sandy beach.description:
You’ve arrived to 'Sandy Beach'. Warm sand beneath your toes and 
the sound of waves splashing. Hundreds of sea shells are spread
along the coast. The 'Landing Zone' is behind you, 'Coco Forest'
is on your left and nearby to your right is 'Moist Marshland'.
sandy beach.name: SANDY BEACH
sandy beach.visibleLocations: LANDING ZONE, MOIST MARSHLAND, and COCO FOREST

coco forest.description:
You’ve arrived at 'Coco Forest'. An abundance of coconuts lie on the floor,
some that have been eaten. The smell of fresh coconut is pleasant.
'Landing Zone' is behind you, the 'Sandy Beach' is to your right, and you
 also see 'Sus Mountain' peaking over behind the trees looking ominous.
coco forest.name: COCO FOREST
coco forest.visibleLocations: LANDING ZONE, SUS MOUNTAIN, and SANDY BEACH

sus mountain.description:
Oh no! You’ve arrived at 'Sus Mountain' and lava is slowly oozing out. 
It seems that there are x days left until an eruption. You need to 
get off of this island quickly! There are some pieces of copper lying
nearby. 'Logarithmic Lake' is up ahead but you need to pass the volcano.
Be careful!
sus mountain.name: SUS MOUNTAIN

logarithmic lake.description:
You arrive at a very beautiful and efficiently running lake. 
 Along the shoreline of the lake, there are patches of dead squirrels and rodents.
 In the lake there are some swimming large-mouth bas, 

 A Wizard appears. He says: “In order to quench your thirst with this magical elixir,
you must talk to me and answer a riddle”:
logarithmic lake.name: LOGARITHMIC LAKE

moist marshland.description:
You have arrived to 'Moist Marshland' and it is just as humid as you
anticipated. The stickiness of the marsh is too much to bear. You look in all
directions and spot 'Luminous Lagoon' ahead of you and 'Sandy Beach' and 'Logarithmic
Lake' in your rear.
moist marshland.name: MOIST MARSHLAND
moist marshland.visibleLocations: SANDY BEACH and LOGARITHMIC LAKE and LUMINOUS LAGOON

luminous lagoon.description:
You’ve arrived at 'Luminous Lagoon'. The ripples shimmer with the reflection
of the sun. The lagoon is lined with material, such as clay or an artificial liner.
luminous lagoon.name: LUMINOUS LAGOON
